snippet.title: Shadow of the Tomb Raider Teaser Trailer [US] - ESRB
snippet.description:
Experience Lara Croft’s defining moment as she becomes the Tomb Raider. Available on Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and PC on September 14th, 2018. Learn more: TombRaider.com 

Subscribe to our channel to keep up-to-date with all things Tomb Raider and Lara Croft: https://www.youtube.com/user/tombraider?sub_confirmation=1

Follow us on Social:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TombRaider
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tombraider
Tumblr: http://tombraider.tumblr.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tombraider
Google +: https://plus.google.com/107380949412135354539
